scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Dormition of the Virgin Mary, with her body lying asleep on the ground, her head resting on her hand, and a golden vessel beside her. Above her, the Virgin Mary is shown ascending to heaven, surrounded by a host of angels. The setting is a rocky, hilly landscape with scattered trees and a building complex in the background. Two figures, possibly mourners or disciples, are visible in the lower part of the scene.
